text.content:
Armor Description
@UUID[.WqWu2qGq4hlXES8Q]
Tier 1		 Base 3 | Flexible (+1 to Evasion)
@UUID[.Gsut1dKZAh8uBd6Y]
Tier 1		 Base 4
@UUID[.4opbkE88HbBoGRms]
Tier 1		 Base 5 | Heavy (−1 to Evasion)
@UUID[.mkHmAM3piv9DyzbB]
Tier 1		 Base 6 | Very Heavy (−2 to Evasion and −1 to Agility)
@UUID[.nH7A7OHTChfi4XZL]
Tier 2		 Base 2 | Reinforced (Increase your armor score by the number of unmarked armor slots you have)
@UUID[.pXRNdVfAKviImr1Q]
Tier 2		 Base 4 | Flexible (+1 to Evasion)
@UUID[.YxVTs33haT6XOuGv]
Tier 2		 Base 5 | Resistant (Mark 2 armor slots to make yourself resistant to the incoming damage instead of reducing it by your armor score.)
@UUID[.scFhfoijkGZUl5as]
Tier 2		 Base 5
@UUID[.rJKpu8C4hAn4anys]
Tier 2		 Base 5 | Sturdy (Before you mark your last armor slot, roll a d6. On a 6, you use the armor without marking the slot.)
@UUID[.KOjKliG8leVZgF59]
Tier 2		 Base 5 | Warded (Each armor slot is worth an extra 2d4 against magic damage.)
@UUID[.YxeyzF8j5rD7LXDs]
Tier 2		 Base 5 | Quiet (+2 to any rolls you make to move without being heard.)
@UUID[.MqbXNvFvYyIu2wqL]
Tier 2		 Base 6 | Heavy (−1 to Evasion)
@UUID[.mVsYE0bIynwGNKg5]
Tier 2		 Base 6 | Hopeful (Anytime you need to spend Hope, you may mark an Armor Slot instead.)
@UUID[.mNtOiDwXpMAL2TBG]
Tier 2		 Base 7 | Very Heavy (−2 to Evasion and −1 to Agility)
@UUID[.b5kAGtBYnQHUfrVO]
Tier 3		 Base 5 | Flexible (+1 to Evasion)
@UUID[.cAmE6Ct5Vy9faI9E]
Tier 3		 Base 6
@UUID[.AoPt2nvn3cRMX8KP]
Tier 3		 Base 6 | Gilded (When you mark an armor slot, you may spend any amount of Hope to also reduce the incoming damage by an amount equal to your proficiency per Hope spent.)
@UUID[.WhXTHBtAkiOs9aWc]
Tier 3		 Base 6 | Impenetrable (When you mark an armor slot, you cannot fill your last hit point as the result of physical damage.)
@UUID[.nDWr3zquUIkXhT03]
Tier 3		 Base 6 | Sharp (Add 1d4 to any damage rolls you make on a successful Melee attack.)
@UUID[.EIYKES2zewgQ2vZO]
Tier 3		 Base 7 | Heavy (−1 to Evasion)
@UUID[.BncSYzGP2vKpGMZd]
Tier 3		 Base 8 | Very Heavy (−2 to Evasion and −1 to Agility)
@UUID[.ZOBce5DEE9qiINOX]
Tier 3		 Base 8 | Physical (You cannot use this armor against Magic damage.)
@UUID[.jI82lF7sLt2xHtJF]
Tier 3		 Base 8 | Magic (You cannot use this armor against Physical damage.)
@UUID[.KElSp044tdt9givc]
Tier 3		 Base 10 | Painful (Mark stress every time you use one or more armor slots on an attack.)
@UUID[.5170Yx9RtmiQQxEn]
Tier 4		 Base 5 | Timeslowing (On any incoming attacks, roll 1d4 and add its value to your Evasion score.)
@UUID[.4lCGxIlauvO9y7OG]
Tier 4		 Base 7 | Channeling (While this armor is equipped, take +1 to all Spellcast rolls.)
@UUID[.dTpw1GLrRQ5dQOcf]
Tier 4		 Base 7 | Flexible (+1 to Evasion)
@UUID[.LVCdXrGeWEqOrHDD]
Tier 4		 Base 8 | Burning (When an enemy strikes you in Melee, they immediately mark a stress.)
@UUID[.NXPh4hzJWx5ZXv8Z]
Tier 4		 Base 8 | Variable (Add +1 to your armor score for every range beyond Melee the damage is coming from.)
@UUID[.1MnrEq5Xrj6Vq5XQ]
Tier 4		 Base 8
@UUID[.bjBiaOZhcXFN907x]
Tier 4		 Base 8 | Truthseeking (This armor glows when anyone within Close range tells a lie.)
@UUID[.XmMDxJuPg1CGKoc4]
Tier 4		 Base 9 | Heavy (−1 to Evasion)
@UUID[.zY8sfKqWV1QVpx5o]
Tier 4		 Base 10 | Very Heavy (−2 to Evasion and −1 to Agility)
@UUID[.rbCGpxdULoxH0DUF]
Tier 4		 Base 15 | Difficult (−1 to all Character Traits)
